response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration and evaluation, I believe we can come to a mutually beneficial arrangement. I am offering you the chance to purchase this unique item for $1,200,000. This price reflects its true worth while allowing for a reasonable profit on my part. I understand the importance of such a significant investment, and I am confident that this product will meet and exceed your expectations. Should you choose to accept this offer, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction promptly. If you need more information or have any questions, feel free to reach out. I look forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
